p: Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 is, at present, the most important topic in medical research; from epidemiology to possible treatments, there are many unknowns in this pandemic. In terms of treatment, there are several potential molecules; from remdesivir, an antiviral previously tested for Ebola already approved by the FDA, to antiretrovirals used against HIV and antimalarials such as hydroxychloroquine. However, a large number of small studies, with different methodologies, cannot adequately identify the most effective and safe treatment.
